body.name: OdoBan Aroma Eliminator Set, 10 Ounce Toilet Spray 360-Degree Continuous Spray Natural Oil Real Citrus Orange Air Freshener and 14 Ounce Solid Scent Absorber
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 17 mins
features: Refresh Your Space: Freshen any room in an instant with our air freshener spray and harsh aroma eliminator gel. This citrus scent pack includes one can of natural oil air freshener and one solid scent absorber.

Natural Freshener: Our real citrus orange air freshener is made with 99.99% natural ingredients. It contains natural citrus oils to freshen any living space for a fresh, clean, and lasting citrus scent. Also works as an in-bowl toilet freshener.

Smell Absorbing Gel: The long-lasting gel absorber keeps any room refreshed and revived. It traps smells while distributing freshness, and can last up to 90 days depending on airflow. Our aroma control solid helps stop frequent airborne scents.

Where to Use: Our citrus scented home fresheners can be used in kitchens, bathrooms, offices, stores, schools, gyms, locker rooms, and more. They can be used in hotels, motels, public transportation, restrooms, near pet areas, and trash cans.

Super Convenient: Eliminate bad smells quickly and easily with our air fresheners. The natural citrus orange room freshener has 360-degree continuous spray technology to spray at any angle, even upside down. Enjoy a fresh smell instantly.
body.description: Our OdoBan ready-to-use 360-degree continuous air freshener plus solid aroma absorber help eliminate harsh scents with a quick and easy solution. This pack comes with one real citrus scented room spray (10 ounces) and one aroma control solid gel (14 ounces). The natural air freshening spray can be sprayed at any angle, even upside down. The pure air technology uses compressed air instead of flammable propellants, and our smell neutralizer is made with 99.99% natural ingredients. The natural citrus oils instantly freshen kitchens, bathrooms, and can be used as a toilet pre-spray to trap smells. Simply spray it into the toilet bowl before use to trap stinky smells under a barrier of natural oils. The real citrus orange air freshener is great even on the go; please see package for specific room freshener instructions. Spritz with the spray and then continuously trap unwanted aromas with the smell absorbing gel. For areas prone to everyday stink near pet litter boxes, bathrooms, or trash cans, the solid scent absorber traps unpleasant smells while emanating a clean, citrus fragrance. Simply remove the lid and place upright in the desired area to start eliminating foul smells. Depending on the area’s traffic and airflow, the pod lasts for up to 90 days to bring your home or office freshness every day. Our deodorizers are great for closets, basements, lockers, gyms, and more. They also help remove musty, mildew, or tobacco smoke smells. Freshen your space with a light, long-lasting scent. OdoBan room freshener and cleaning products can be used in households and business facilities of all types including schools, athletic centers, hotels, motels, public restrooms, and restaurants. At OdoBan, we believe in creating quality products that are as effective as they are affordable with a motto of ""if we don't love using it ourselves, we don't make it here."" Make life fresh with OdoBan. *EPA List N (EPA Reg. No 66243-2)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have used the eucalyptus and fresh linen Odoban scents and the smell is very light and dissipates quickly. And it is great for eliminating odors. But the Citrus Orange is awful!! It does not have a light orange scent! I did a short spray and then got a whiff of it…I started coughing and gauging! It doesn’t smell like oranges to me at all!!! I realize that for others this may be a refreshing smell. But be aware, this is non-returnable!!! (Which I could swear when I ordered it said it was… 🤷‍♀️) That is part of the reason for only one star!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Neither product worked
reviews.reviewText: The canister that was supposed to absorb odors and provide a nice scent has no smell whatsoever and did not absorb odors. The Spray can would not spray. You could tell there was something in it when shaken, but there was no charge in it so it would not spray anything out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice smell, works to hide the odors
